title: The Weeknd’s ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow’ Completes Trilogy | Music You Should Know | Billboard News
description: The Weeknd has released the final installment in his trilogy, ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ With an album filled with features from Lana Del Rey, Anitta and more, he also announced his ‘After Hours Til Dawn’ tour bringing Playboi Carti with him. Keep watching for everything you need to know about The Weeknd! What’s your favorite song […]
author: Katie Cao
excerpt: The Weeknd has completed his trilogy with ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ He also announced his ‘After Hours Til Dawn’ tour bringing Playboi Carti with him.
text: The Weeknd has released the final installment in his trilogy, ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ With an album filled with features from Lana Del Rey, Anitta and more, he also announced his ‘After Hours Til Dawn’ tour bringing Playboi Carti with him. Keep watching for everything you need to know about The Weeknd! What’s your favorite song from ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow’? Let us know in the comments! Tetris Kelly: The trilogy is complete. The Weeknd’s new album has arrived and not only is it full of some major collabs, he’s heading on tour. This is music you should know: ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ Concluding the trilogy that began with 2020’s ‘After Hours’ and 2022’s ‘Dawn FM,’ The Weeknd experiments on the 84-minute ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ It features Lana Del Rey, Travis Scott, Anitta and more. The Toronto crooner announced the ‘After Hours Til Dawn’ Tour, where he’s hitting some stadiums and bringing Playboi Carti with him. The outing is slated to kick off in Phoenix on May 9 before wrapping up in San Antonio on Sept. 3. For more on the tour and album, hit Billboard.com.
html:
The Weeknd has released the final installment in his trilogy, ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ With an album filled with features from Lana Del Rey, Anitta and more, he also announced his ‘After Hours Til Dawn’ tour bringing Playboi Carti with him. Keep watching for everything you need to know about The Weeknd!

What’s your favorite song from ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow’? Let us know in the comments!

Tetris Kelly:

The trilogy is complete. The Weeknd’s new album has arrived and not only is it full of some major collabs, he’s heading on tour. This is music you should know: ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ Concluding the trilogy that began with 2020’s ‘After Hours’ and 2022’s ‘Dawn FM,’ The Weeknd experiments on the 84-minute ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow.’ It features Lana Del Rey, Travis Scott, Anitta and more. The Toronto crooner announced the ‘After Hours Til Dawn’ Tour, where he’s hitting some stadiums and bringing Playboi Carti with him. The outing is slated to kick off in Phoenix on May 9 before wrapping up in San Antonio on Sept. 3. For more on the tour and album, hit Billboard.com.
